chores...\""},{"lineNumber":126523,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、でも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-but...\""},{"lineNumber":126524,"originalJapaneseLine":"「す、好きな人の為に……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I want to work hard for the person I love...\""},{"lineNumber":126525,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頑張りたいんです！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to do my best!\""},{"lineNumber":126526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":126527,"originalJapaneseLine":"ビスケッタの眼鏡が光った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Biscetta's glasses gleamed."},{"lineNumber":126528,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……分かりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I understand.\""},{"lineNumber":126529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私で良ければ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If I am acceptable,"},{"lineNumber":126530,"originalJapaneseLine":"　できる限りのことをさせて頂きます」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will do everything I can for you.\""},{"lineNumber":126531,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあっ、ありがとうございます！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, thank you very much!"},{"lineNumber":126532,"originalJapaneseLine":"　野菊、がんばります！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Nogiku will do her best!\""},{"lineNumber":126533,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ただ、その……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, but, um..."},{"lineNumber":126534,"originalJapaneseLine":"　野菊、本当に覚えが悪いので……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Nogiku really is a slow learner, so...\""},{"lineNumber":126535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう手加減抜きで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please be strict with her, no holding back,"},{"lineNumber":126536,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出来るだけ厳しくお願いします！」","translatedEnglishLine":"be as strict as possible!\""},{"lineNumber":126537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう手加減抜きで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No holding back,"},{"lineNumber":126538,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出来るだけ、","translatedEnglishLine":"as much as possible,"},{"lineNumber":126539,"originalJapaneseLine":"厳しく","translatedEnglishLine":"strictly"},{"lineNumber":126540,"originalJapaneseLine":"……ですか」","translatedEnglishLine":"...is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":126541,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes!\""},{"lineNumber":126542,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かしこまりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Understood.\""},{"lineNumber":126543,"originalJapaneseLine":"「出来るだけ、厳しく、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will educate her as strictly as possible,"},{"lineNumber":126544,"originalJapaneseLine":"　教育させて頂きます」","translatedEnglishLine":"and train her to the best of my ability.\""},{"lineNumber":126545,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふわぁ〜、暇だなぁ〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yawn~ I'm so bored~."},{"lineNumber":126546,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ザリガニでも釣りに行こうかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe I'll go crayfish fishing."},{"lineNumber":126547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですねぇ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right,"},{"lineNumber":126548,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日はポカポカいい天気なので、","translatedEnglishLine":"today is warm and sunny,"},{"lineNumber":126549,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それもいいですねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"that sounds nice too.\""},{"lineNumber":126550,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":126551,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ドゴォォォォン！＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<THUDDDDD!>"},{"lineNumber":126552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃああああ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaaa!?\""},{"lineNumber":126553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんだぁ？　敵襲か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What was that? Is it an enemy attack?\""},{"lineNumber":126554,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、違います。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it's not."},{"lineNumber":126555,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お騒がせして申し訳ありません、御主人様」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry for the disturbance, Master.\""},{"lineNumber":126556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「野菊様がランス城の","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Nogiku fell while cleaning the windows"},{"lineNumber":126557,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最上階の窓掃除の最中に落ちました」","translatedEnglishLine":"on the top floor of Rance Castle.\""},{"lineNumber":126558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うお、ビスケッタさん！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, Biscetta!?\""},{"lineNumber":126559,"originalJapaneseLine":"　って、野菊が落ちたのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You mean Nogiku fell?\""},{"lineNumber":126560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「野菊様、大丈夫ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Nogiku, are you okay?\""},{"lineNumber":126561,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うきゅう……痛いですぅ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ukyuu... it hurts...\""},{"lineNumber":126562,"originalJapaneseLine":"「生きてるぞ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She's alive..."},{"lineNumber":126563,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんと頑丈な……」","translatedEnglishLine":"how incredibly sturdy...\""},{"lineNumber":126564,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんの音かと思ったら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was wondering what the noise was..."},{"lineNumber":126565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「窓掃除って……","translatedEnglishLine":"Window cleaning..."},{"lineNumber":126566,"originalJapaneseLine":"　野菊は超絶ドジなんだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Nogiku is extremely clumsy,"},{"lineNumber":126567,"originalJapaneseLine":"　絶対にやっちゃいけない奴だねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"she definitely shouldn't be doing it.\""},{"lineNumber":126568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、頑丈だから","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, since she's sturdy,"},{"lineNumber":126569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その点だけは向いてるかもだけどー」","translatedEnglishLine":"maybe that's the only thing she's suited for.\""},{"lineNumber":126570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ドジっ子なのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, she's a clumsy girl.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう一度仰って頂けますでしょうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could you please say that once more?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「野菊をビスケッタさんの弟子にして下さい！」
お客様のご要望には出来るだけ応えたいのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to meet the customer's requests as much as I can,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念ながら私は弟子は取っておりません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but unfortunately, I do not take apprentices."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「野菊……昔からお料理や洗濯の家事が駄目で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nogiku... has always been no good at cooking and laundry chores..."
"I-I want to work hard for the person I love..."
I want to do my best!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタの眼鏡が光った。
できる限りのことをさせて頂きます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will do everything I can for you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあっ、ありがとうございます！
野菊、本当に覚えが悪いので……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nogiku really is a slow learner, so..."
"Please be strict with her, no holding back,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来るだけ厳しくお願いします！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will educate her as strictly as possible,
and train her to the best of my ability."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザリガニでも釣りに行こうかな」
今日はポカポカいい天気なので、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What was that? Is it an enemy attack?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お騒がせして申し訳ありません、御主人様」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Nogiku fell while cleaning the windows

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最上階の窓掃除の最中に落ちました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: on the top floor of Rance Castle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って、野菊が落ちたのか？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was wondering what the noise was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 野菊は超絶ドジなんだから、
絶対にやっちゃいけない奴だねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she definitely shouldn't be doing it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その点だけは向いてるかもだけどー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: maybe that's the only thing she's suited for."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

お客様のご要望には出来るだけ応えたいのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to meet the customer's requests as much as I can,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念ながら私は弟子は取っておりません」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nogiku... has always been no good at cooking and laundry chores..."

I want to do my best!"

できる限りのことをさせて頂きます」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will educate her as strictly as possible,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Nogiku fell while cleaning the windows

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最上階の窓掃除の最中に落ちました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: on the top floor of Rance Castle."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was wondering what the noise was...

絶対にやっちゃいけない奴だねー」
